Subject: Notification of {!AmendmentRequest__c.Id} approval.
This email is to notify you that Amendment Request for the Award {!AmendmentRequest__c.AwardName__c} has been approved by Program Officer and is now waiting for your review.
Below are the details:
Amendment Request Summary:
Amendment Request Number #: {!AmendmentRequest__c.Name}
Amendment Request Type: {!AmendmentRequest__c.Type__c}
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely,
EGMS Team
